collection.name: CatBlox Genesis Collection
collection.description:
## THE GENESIS COLLECTION IS THE MOST EXCLUSIVE TIER OF CATBLOX MEMBERSHIP.

### It includes access to:

Unlimited Season Pass for All Seasons  
Exclusive Genesis merchandise  
Access to Airdrops and Studio Releases  
Alpha group access  
CatBlox Amenities Program & Wellness Studio Access  
Treasury voting privileges  
IRL event(s) access  
VIP Metaverse lounge access  
Allowlists  
Genesis community competitions and gaming  

& More!

### Genesis Collection members have access to all future seasons as long as you hold a Genesis Collection NFT. Seasons last approx. 75 days and include:

Air Drop NFTs  
IRL events (multi-city, international)  
Metaverse events  
Studio Collection releases (limited edition, limited quantity 1/1s)  
Collaborations with major brands and artists  
Limited edition, limited quantity capsule collection (Genesis holders get WL priority)  

Our CatBlox Season 1 Air Drop is the MetaPortal - https://opensea.io/collection/catbloxmetaportals
